summary: a replacement for the male underwear in the game.
descriptionHtml:
Name          : Male Undie Variants
Version       : V1
Date          :  20 Jan 2012
Catagory      : Replacement Texture
Author(s)     : jsnider193
-------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------

INDEX
-----

--------Description

--------Detail

--------Location

--------Installation:
-----------Manual Installation

--------Uninstallation:
-----------Manual Uninstallation

--------Upgrade

--------Known issues and bugs

--------Incompatibilities

--------Contact

--------Credits

--------Tools Used

--------Legal and licensing

-------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:
------------
A simple male underware replacement .. got tired of all the changes for female and decided to do one for males.  Also the washed out somewhat used look of the in game stuff got on my nerves so another reason to do this.

Detail:
-------
General:  Version 1.0 of this mod adds in a variant for male underwear.

Detail:  This file contains the texture for the male underwear dds replacemnt it will overwrite the existing white set in the game, no esp is included.


---Installation:---
-------------------
Manual Installation:
--------------------
Just copy into the data folder and let it do it\'s thing.


---Uninstallation:---
---------------------
Manual Uninstallation:
----------------------
Delete the supplied texture and you will go back to the off white thingee.


Upgrade:
--------
Can add more variants if folks really want them.  I just wanted something other then white with stains.

Known issues and bugs:
----------------------
If some other mod overwrote the same dds file then well there will be a conflict.


Incompatabilities:
------------------
None known at this time.


Contact:
--------
Leave a message here or send me a personnel


Credits:
--------
Riven Tats (a resource found in FNV) used to decorate them there undies.


Tools Used:
-----------
Pyr√≤s: GuideLines (http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278)
NifScope (http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope)
GIMP (http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920)


Legal and licensing:
--------------------
You can modify and use as needed, but give credit if feel like it.  Don\'t really mind if don\'t as I had fun making so that is all that matters
author: JSnider193
